Review: The zoom function is quite disappointing.
The flash is weaker than my old camera.
Colors aren't as vivid as shown in ads.
Really disappointed with the low-light performance.
The auto-focus keeps missing important shots.
The image quality isn't what I expected at all.
Memory card compatibility issues are frustrating.
Battery life is shorter than advertised.
Expected better quality for this price range.
The menu system is unnecessarily complicated.
Feeling let down by the build quality.
